title: Faurecia-Aptoide signs up Mercedes in infotainment win over Google
text: Mercedes-Benz will use embedded Faurecia-Aptoide technology to power navigation and other vehicle infotainment functions in a crucial win for the app provider against Alphabet Inc's Google and other technology firms to control car dashboards.

title: 5 Quality Stocks With High GF Scores and Momentum
text: In light of U.S. markets gyrating up and down during the final week of April, five high-quality stocks with high GF Scores and momentum ranks include Apple Inc. ( AAPL , Financial), Alphabet Inc. ( GOOGL , Financial)( GOOG , Financial), Amphenol Corp. ( APH , Financial), Fastenal Co. ( FAST , Financial) and Edwards Lifesciences Corp. ( EW , Financial) according to the All-in-One Screener, a Premium feature of GuruFocus.

title: Alphabet Is an Opportunity for Many Reasons
text: GOOG stock is trending lower of late, but it has plenty of tailwinds and a track record of bouncing back, making it a buy. The post Alphabet Is an Opportunity for Many Reasons appeared first on InvestorPlace.

title: Is It Time To Buy Netflix And Alphabet Again? Experts Say Beaten Down Tech Stocks Are Value Plays
text: Some analysts say big tech stocks are today's value buys.

title: Alphabet: A Buying Opportunity While Markets Continue To Focus On Short-Term Fundamentals
text: Alphabet reported strong 1Q22 numbers despite a minor bottom-line miss and YouTube revenue coming in below analyst guesstimates. Google remains a best-of-breed name in digital advertising with a highly durable moat in search while the cloud business continues to grow at a fast pace.

title: Stock Market Today: Microsoft Delivers, Alphabet Disappoints in Flat Day for Stocks
text: The major indexes managed to mostly stop the bleeding after yesterday's rout, but they didn't gain much ground, either, amid mixed earnings reports from a range of blue-chip stocks. Microsoft (MSFT, +4.8%) shares were jolted higher Wednesday following the software maker's stellar quarterly report last night.

title: The Ratings Game: Google's troubles lead analysts to point fingers squarely at YouTube
text: Google parent Alphabet Inc. is on firmer ground than most online ad companies, but YouTube is a big question mark.

title: Google to pay $100 million class-action settlement in Illinois biometric privacy lawsuit
text: Illinois residents who have appeared in a photograph on the Google Photos app within the last seven years may be eligible for a cut of a $100 million class-action privacy settlement reached by Google this month.

title: Why Alphabet Stock Slumped on Wednesday
text: Google's parent company delivered a mixed earnings report.

title: Google's Biggest Challenge Is Not Priced In
text: Most of the attention in this earnings call has been given to slower growth numbers in YouTube; however, Google Other segment was a bigger surprise. Majority of Google Other revenue comes from Play Store which is facing increasing headwinds due to new regulations.

title: Your phone number on Google? Search giant now takes removal demands
text: Alphabet Inc's Google has begun entertaining people's requests to remove search results containing their home addresses, phone numbers and email accounts, the latest shift in its stance between personal privacy and access to information.

title: Google Q1 Earnings: Warren Buffett Should Take Another Look Now
text: Warren Buffett regretted he made the wrong call in not buying Google Inc. You will see the key reasons for his regret are still valid now: its toll status, broad-based growth in the double-digits, and extreme capital allocation flexibility.

title: Does Alphabet Offer Value After Earnings Miss?
text: Alphabet Inc. ( GOOGL , Financial)( GOOG , Financial) has seen the share price of its Class A stock decrease by 20% from highs in December 2021. About 10% of that decline has come in the last five days as the Mountain View, California-based company announced earnings that missed guidance.

title: Alphabet: A Great Value After Earnings
text: Alphabet released first quarter earnings yesterday; they were in-line on revenue and a miss on EPS. The company has a rock-solid competitive position, with moats in search, long form video and budget smartphones.

title: Microsoft Rises, Alphabet Falls Because 'Not All Technology Stocks Are Created Equal'
text: Microsoft gets a boost from better-than-expected guidance for its fiscal fourth quarter, and strong demand for its cloud services.

title: Why Alphabet Shares Are Falling Today
text: Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ: GOOGL) (NASDAQ: GOOG) shares are trading lower Wednesday after the company reported worse-than-expected financial results. Alphabet said first-quarter revenue increased 23% year-over-year to $68.01 billion, which came in below the $68.04 billion estimate, according to data.

title: 7 Stocks to Watch for Major Insider Trading Clues
text: These seven stocks show varying degrees of insider trading, which can provide a hint regarding each company or fund's performance. The post 7 Stocks to Watch for Major Insider Trading Clues appeared first on InvestorPlace.

title: Google, Facebook defended by small business owners in bizarre newspaper letters
text: As Capitol Hill seeks to rein in Big Tech, a slew of local business owners are slamming the proposed antitrust legislation in letters to the editors of local newspapers across the US — and they appear to be working off talking points that are strikingly similar to each other. At least a half-dozen pieces bashing.

title: Alphabet's YouTube sales hit by Ukraine war and Apple privacy changes
text: Shares in Google and Youtube owner Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ:GOOG) are expected to fall today despite publishing a seemingly strong set of results.  First quarter revenues of US$68.0bn were up 26% on a constant currency basis and broadly in line with Wall Street expectations, with profit up 22% to US$20.1bn.

title: Microsoft Stock Rises on Cloud Growth, Alphabet Tumbles on a YouTube Miss
text: Software maker Microsoft gets a boost from better-than-expected guidance for its fiscal fourth quarter, and strong demand for its cloud services.

title: Google parent suffers 1Q growth slowdown, profit decline
text: Google's corporate parent on Tuesday posted its slowest quarterly revenue growth since 2020, the latest sign that the huge gains enjoyed by technology companies during the pandemic are fading into the rear-view mirror.

title: Market Snapshot: U.S. stock futures hint at rebound for Wall Street, with Microsoft, Alphabet earnings in focus
text: U.S. stock futures were pointing to gains for Wall Street on Wednesday, with tech in focus following mixed results from Microsoft Corp. and Alphabet Inc. and the worst day for the Nasdaq Composite since 2020.
